item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, April 28, 2025 at 1:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Internet in a Box (201 points | 63 comments)
2. New material gives copper superalloy-like strength (17 points | 3 comments)
3. Show HN: I486SX_soft_FPU – Software FPU Emulator for NetBSD 10 on 486SX (49 points | 14 comments)
4. How a single line of code could brick your iPhone (165 points | 41 comments)
5. Read the Obits (176 points | 66 comments)
6. National Archives Releases Unidentified Anomalous Phenomena (UAP) Records (40 points | 21 comments)
7. AI Helps Find a Cause of Alzheimer's Disease and Identify Therapeutic Candidate (30 points | 15 comments)
8. Show HN: I made a web-based, free alternative to Screen Studio (6 points | discuss)
9. I just want to code (2023) (58 points | 21 comments)
10. The suburban office park that launched Silicon Valley (26 points | 1 comment)
11. Did 5G kill the IMSI catcher? (150 points | 55 comments)
12. Restoring a Sinclair C5 (30 points | 6 comments)
13. How a Pipe Organ Works (2020) (30 points | 7 comments)
14. Reverse geocoding is hard (173 points | 90 comments)
15. Computer Architects Can't Find the Average (16 points | 3 comments)
16. Cut: Chattanooga Civic User Testing (25 points | 3 comments)
17. The coming knowledge-work supply-chain crisis (112 points | 65 comments)

20. Business co-founders in tech startups are less valuable than they think (159 points | 130 comments)
21. Libogc (Wii homebrew library) discovered to contain code stolen from RTEMS (152 points | 95 comments)
22. Extend (YC W23) is hiring engineers to build LLM document processing ( | hide)
23. Show HN: I created snapDOM to capture DOM nodes as images with exceptional speed (85 points | 33 comments)
24. Virginia passes law to enforce maximum vehicle speeds for repeat speeders (67 points | 155 comments)
25. ZFS: Apple's new filesystem that wasn't (2016) (135 points | 130 comments)
26. Show HN: Bhvr, a Bun and Hono and Vite and React Starter (65 points | 54 comments)
27. TmuxAI: AI-Powered, Non-Intrusive Terminal Assistant (115 points | 30 comments)
28. Boxie – an always offline audio player for my 3 year old (20 points | discuss)
29. Show HN: Daily Jailbreak – Prompt Engineer's Wordle (62 points | 38 comments)
30. In Memoriam: SF and Fine Artist David Schleinkofer (7 points | 1 comment)
